text: Deo Gracia Ngokaba (born 17 May 1997) is a Congolese judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's +100 kg, where he was eliminated by Roy Meyer in the second round. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Republic of the Congo male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of the Republic of the Congo Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:African Games bronze medalists for the Republic of the Congo Category:African Games medalists in judo Category:Competitors at the 2015 African Games
title: Deo Gracia Ngokaba
